name: Graphite Journey
description:
Explore a forest and gather fruits for your lizard mount so you can go home.

Made for Ludum Dare 48!

Controls: WASD 

Music: Fingerlympics  by Doctor Turtle https://doctorturtle.bandcamp.com/track/fingerlympics

Sound effect:  https://freesound.org/people/timmy_h123/sounds/160503/#

Art is hand-drawn on paper and scanned.
